name: Iven
appearance: Tall and spare with ink-stained fingers, brass plate-dust at the cuffs, and a voice like riverstone.
character: Stern in court, unexpectedly kind in private.
talents: Feels when a spoken name is false
Recalls every sworn case he has heard
flaws: Indecisive when ethics and survival collide
dreams: Restore the Tide-Pledge in spirit, not just letter
Raise a new generation of truly neutral witnesses
secrets: Bargained at the Whispering Moor and gave a fragment of his true name to save a child from oath lashings
Shelters defectors who regret Embersleeve oaths in a hidden annex
